Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Trying to get to grips with stuff on the forums and struggling. Except for the challenges, simple to understand where everything is.

Started playing KSP demo June last year, but then after a couple of months or so bought the full game. I started uploading videos of my exploits November ish last year.

Been mainly working on space stations and bases.

System Specs:

Liquid cooled custom built system.

AMD Athlon II X2 3GHz @ 3.8GHz

4GB Kingston Hyper-X DUAL DDR3 400MHz @ 560MHz (base speed)

AMD/ATI Radeon 4770 512MB GDDR5 (core 750MHz mem 800MHz defaults) @ 830MHz core 850MHZ mem

Twin 19" flat screens.

Would love to get involved with KSP multiplayer but can't seem to find it.

Youtube account name is comwarrior69. My youtube account is used for everything i get up to.

Any questions, give me a shout.

Welcome aboard! You definitely seem to know your way around the game.

Here's a link that may interest you regarding KMP!
Welcome aboard, Com. I see Max has got you covered as far as KMP. It's nice to see another youtuber.

In the words of a sponge and his friend: Welcome to our club~! Welcome to our club~! Welcome youtuber! Welcome youtuber! Welcome youtuber!

P.S. My youtube name is usfup328 and almost all of my youtube videos is a challenge for ksp.

Thanks max... appreciated.

So, i've read the FAQ's etc for it... i understand it might nuke my pc...

The question now is... does some kind wonderfull person have a server i can play on and fly some heavy metal?

Just want to say hello, and welcome to the forums. The forums here seems kinda daunting at first, but them really simple once you understand it. Also I am sure you can fly your "heavy metal" on any KMP server. Goodluck and have fun!!
Welcome! You will find that most of the forum members are friendly enough.

Also, i would appreciate any suggestions about video content etc...

Constructive criticism is always welcome.
